subject: Management
title: The Stockdale Paradox
description: A quick win: understand The Stockdale Paradox.

hook.text: Admiral Stockdale survived 7 years as a POW. The optimists in his camp died first.

buildup.text: The optimists kept saying: we'll be out by Christmas. When Christmas passed, they broke.

discovery.text: Stockdale's insight: confront the brutal facts while maintaining unwavering faith in the outcome.

twist.text: False optimism kills. Honest realism paired with long-term belief sustains.

climax.text: Tell your team the truth about today. Then remind them why you'll win eventually.

punchline.text: Face the facts. Keep the faith. Both at once.

quiz.question: What is the Stockdale Paradox?
options: Confront brutal facts while maintaining faith in eventual success
Stay optimistic and ignore negative information
Prepare for the worst and never expect positive outcomes
